summary: Para la versión de esta página en español, ver a GAO-23-106186 . DOD and the State Department provide equipment—such as vehicles and night-vision goggles—to El Salvador, Guatemala, and Honduras. This assistance is intended to help address widespread security challenges and totaled over $66 million from FYs 2017-2021. Some equipment has allegedly been misused. For example, government officials in Guatemala allegedly used Jeeps from DOD to...
title: Northern Triangle: DOD and State Need Improved Policies to Address Equipment Misuse
